LanguageData.AM_AbilityNeedsADownedPawn: This ability must target a downed sapient humanoid
LanguageData.AM_AbilityNeedsAValidAnimal: This ability must target a living, non-dryad animal
LanguageData.AM_AbilityNeedsABlueprint: This ability needs to target a building frame that is under construction
LanguageData.AM_AbilityNeedsResourcesDelivered: All resources must have been delivered to the building frame
LanguageData.AM_NoDataBaseFound: You'll need to build an animal database before this ability can be used
LanguageData.AM_ShowAnimalAnalysisDesc: This will show you a list of possible animals that need to be scanned.
LanguageData.AM_OnlyOneDatabase: Only one database can be built
LanguageData.AM_AnimalAlreadyScanned: This animal has already been scanned for the database
LanguageData.AM_AnimalScanned: {0} has been scanned into the animal database
LanguageData.AM_NoEmptyReliquary: no empty accessible relic smashing altar
LanguageData.AM_NeedsFullAltar: Relic smashing altar needs to have a relic installed to start the ritual
LanguageData.AM_AbilityNeedsMeme: This ability can't be used if the colonist's ideo doesn't have the necessary meme
LanguageData.AM_MakeChangeStyleAbilityUseAllStyles: Make the "Change Style" ability use styles not possessed by the player's main ideoligion
LanguageData.AM_MakeChangeStyleAbilityUseAllStyles_To: Make the "Change Style" ability use styles not possessed by the player's main ideoligion. By default this leader role ability will swap an item's style through the styles present in the colony's main ideo. By activating this toggle you will make it use ALL styles currently present in the game (vanilla or modded)
LanguageData.Funeral_ThingInfoPower: Needs {0} for last rites. Which must be powered or fueled
LanguageData.Funeral_RoleNotDead: {0} Requires the pawn to be dead
LanguageData.Funeral_DisabledCorpseInaccessible: No accessible dead colonists, recover their body if possible
LanguageData.Funeral_LaunchableRoofed: Unable to launch due to roof above pod
LanguageData.Funeral_LaunchableNoFuel: Unable to launch due to no fuel for pod
LanguageData.Funeral_NoHopper: No reachable hopper around the nutrient paste dispenser
LanguageData.Funeral_NutrientPaste: A nutrient paste dispenser, powered and with hoppers
